pr_title: [FLINK-19259][Kinesis] Remove references to allow classloader unloading

timeline.author: zentol
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -128,12 +129,11 @@ * *

The release hook is executed just before the user code class loader is being released. * Registration only happens if no hook has been registered under this name already. - *

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we be able to use getClass().getClassLoader()? Then we wouldn't have to modify the RuntimeContext API.
timeline.author: zentol

replies.bodyText:
Ignore my previous suggestion; we shouldn't do that on the off-chance that the connector is loaded via /lib.
Could we use RuntimeContext#getUserCodeClassLoader instead?
replies.author: zentol

timeline.bodyText:
This should be the key change necessary to ensure the ClassLoader can be cleaned up.
We shouldn't have to touch the FileAgeManager#instance reference; so long as no thread has references to them we should be good.
timeline.author: zentol

replies.bodyText: You are right. Only the thread pool is the problem.
replies.author: rmetzger

timeline.bodyText: Why are we clearing this singleton?
timeline.author: zentol

replies.bodyText: That's again not needed. I'll remove that.
replies.author: rmetzger

timeline.bodyText: It would be good to add a version reference for which aws-java-sdk-core was used.
